pages.title: Buddysteel
pages.text: Buddysteel is an alloy made of metal and pure Buddycards. This alloy is forged of pure childhood spirit, and is used to make many Buddycard-related items.

pages.title: Foils
pages.text: To make Buddycard Steel, you first need to make Buddycard Blend. Then, blasting this blend in a Blast Furnace will yield 1 Buddysteel Ingot.
